features: High Quality Die Cut Oracal Vinyl. Made In The USA.
Will Not Damage Walls. Easily Removed, Not Resusable. Other sizes and colors can be made. Message us for details.
description: Our unique designed wall decal is the perfect addition to any room. You will receive one elegant made to order wall decal for one low price. The decal colors are a matte finish which will look like a painted on wall mural once applied. Your friends and family will envy your home and you with this wonderfully designed decal. The decal can be applied to slightly textured or smooth walls and can be applied to any type of smooth surface such as glass, mirror, finished wood, canvas, etc. Easy application and video tutorial instructions are included. Our DIY decal comes ready to apply with application tape intact for easy setup. Other specialty colors can be made. Please contact us for details.

IMAGE SHOWN for display purpose only. We use Oracal brand indoor vinyl. It is specifically made for indoor use and will not damage walls and can last up to 7 years. It is easy to remove by just peeling it off when done, but cannot be reused. It is a great way to decorate when you are unable to paint such as apartments as it will not damage walls when removed.
Looking for something else? Email us anytime and we can create a decal specifically for you! All products are designed and made right here in the USA. Copyright and Trademark by WallPressions.
